name: Roboport
description:
Roboport is about a cute robot and portals.
You have to get higher until the lava reaches you. You can do this with the help of 3 coloured portals.

You have to shoot a portal to a pillar in the correct colour to get higher.

You shoot a blue portal with "J", purple with "K" and green with "L". You can moove left with "A", right with "D".

GLHF
